description:
cmd/gc: Make constant evaluation errors prettier

This patch makes it more obvious why the constant evaluation
failed and directs the user to the exact expression that caused it to fail

Fixes issue 2804.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

Thanks for the patch, but we're in bug fix mode for Go 1
and I'd like to postpone this CL until after Go 1 is out.
I agree that the errors could be done better, but I'm not
sure that introducing a global is the way to do it.

Please ping us after Go 1 has been released.

Thanks.
Russ

subject: code review 5601051: cmd/gc: Make constant evaluation errors prettier
